instructions.raw_text: DS    F                Net pay after deductions
CLC   EMPREC(8),=CL8' '   Check if employee ID blank
BNH   VALERR               Error if zero or negative
BH    TAXHI            Branch if high earner
TM    PAYFLAG,X'02'    Check valid record flag
BNO   HHLTEXIT         Skip if record not valid
TM    PAYFLAG,X'02'    Check valid record flag
BNO   RTEXIT           Skip if not valid
MVC   OUTREC,OUTBUFF   Move formatted line to output
